description: Valve just released the latest stable update to Proton, the compatibility layer for running Windows games on Linux desktop and Steam Deck with Proton 9.0-2 bringing some fun additions.
title: Proton 9.0-2 brings better controller support in launchers, more playable games, lots of bug fixes

description: A new lawsuit was filed earlier this month in the UK that alleges Valve, owner of Steam, has been "overcharging 14 million PC gamers and abusing its dominant position in the UK".
title: Valve faces a £656 million lawsuit in the UK for 'overcharging 14 million PC gamers'

description: Bittersweet Birthday is a game that hasn't been mentioned here in quite some time, but thankfully World Eater Games have a big update to share on this unique action adventure RPG.
title: Combat encounters are a challenging and unique experience in Bittersweet Birthday

description: With a map that erodes and grows as the game progresses, Terrorformer TD puts a rather unique spin on the tower defense genre.
title: Terrorformer TD is a tower defense roguelite with a map you terraform as you go

description: Points for trying something a little different with the life sim genre here. Sally puts you aboard a magic flying ship, which is a bit unusual.
title: Sally is a life sim about community and belonging aboard a magic flying ship

description: Psychroma looks pretty wild. A narrative-driven side-scroller where you play as a digital medium. Confront the past by piecing together the broken memories of a cybernetic house, and exorcise the ghosts in the machine.
title: Piece together the broken memories of a cybernetic house in Psychroma

description: In the game Prickle you play as a hedgehog dad trying to collect all your children, as they've done a bit of a runner so you need to stick them all together and get them back home.
title: Prickle is a wholesome Sokoban-style puzzler about catching baby hedgehogs

description: French solo developer Kalinarm has a demo available for Linkito, a logic puzzler all about making engineering connections.
title: Logic puzzler Linkito will tease your brain as you connect everything together
